dialogue.introduction: We meet again, Admiral. It's Mogami. How's my flight deck? Does it suit me?
dialogue.library_intro: First of the Mogami-class heavy cruisers. By taking off my stern cannons and replacing them with an aviation deck, the Aviation Cruiser was developed! Equal fire and air power, howzat!
dialogue.secretary1: Admiral, have you got something for me to do?
dialogue.secretary2: You interested in my flight deck?
dialogue.secretary3: Yeaaah, well, I am different from the regular carriers. If you use me well, I think it'll be interesting, you know?
dialogue.secretaryidle: Admiral! Oh, you're busy? I'm going out for some workout.
dialogue.secretarymarried: I'm always crashing because I've only got eyes for you, Admiral! Just kidding!
dialogue.wedding: Admiral, wassup? What's with that look? Is there something up with my flight deck?
dialogue.show_players_score: Looks like there's a notice for the Admiral
dialogue.equipment1: Ooh, you're gonna make me even stronger?
dialogue.equipment2: So you use it like this... huh~
dialogue.docking_minor_damage: Going in for repairs. Why do I keep running into friends...? This sucks...
dialogue.docking_moderate_damage: Aaah... my long-awaited flight deck came to nothing, damnit...
dialogue.docking_complete: An ally has return from the dock.
dialogue.return_from_sortie: The operation is over, the fleet has come back
dialogue.night_attack: Gathering the rains of summer, how swift it is... Basho, right?
dialogue.artillery_spotting: Gathering the rains of summer, how swift it is... Basho, right?
dialogue.night_special_attack_modifier_cutin_at_n: Gathering the rains of summer, how swift it is... Basho, right?
dialogue.support_expedition_team_arrival: Gathering the rains of summer, how swift it is... Basho, right?
dialogue.mvp: This is my true power, dude. 'cause I'm something like the pioneer of the helicopter destroyers, you know?
dialogue.moderately_damaged: Damnit! A direct hit... that's no joke...
dialogue.sunk: Ugh...I wonder if I can apologize to Mikuma in the other world...
dialogue.air_battle: Gathering the rains of summer, how swift it is... Basho, right?
dialogue.rainy_season_2015: Admiral, don't move for a bit. See, wearing your hat this way is cooler!

hourly.0200: 0200. Say, I didn't know I have to do night shifts.
hourly.0300: 0300. *yawn* Eh? You're still working in this late time? Thank you for your work!
hourly.0400: 0400. *big yawn* Man, Admiral sure works hard.
hourly.0500: 0500. Huh? Ah, I was dreaming a bit just now.
hourly.0600: 0600. What was my dream about? That's a secret!
hourly.0700: 0700. Is it OK if i sleep now?
hourly.0800: 0800. Oh, come on. Your office has a futon, right?
hourly.0900: 0900. Ehh? You've packed the futon? Well, the kotatsu is fine too.
hourly.1000: 1000. Your eyes are wide open when you're bustling.
hourly.1200: 1200. Admiral, let's fill up at lunch, okay?
hourly.1300: 1300. I'm stuffed! Dessert goes in a different stomach, though.
hourly.1400: 1400. Mmm, Mamiya's ice cream is delicious! Admiral, you got cream on your face... Yep, there you go!
hourly.1500: 1500. If the meal comes with dessert, I guess I can do the night shift.
hourly.1600: 1600. I managed to eat a lot, but I'm sleepy now.
hourly.1700: 1700. I'm so tired, I feel like I can sleep while walking...Oh, sorry!
hourly.1800: 1800. This... This is the Admirals office!? Why!?
hourly.1900: 1900. The Admiral carried me here!? I'm really sorry!
hourly.2000: 2000. Wah! I'm supposed to make curry for dinner tonight!... Hm... this smell....
hourly.2100: 2100. Admiral, As a backup, Kumarinko brought some curry she made. Well, let's dig in!
hourly.2200: 2200. Eating curry together with the Admiral makes it delicious. I could eat it every day!
hourly.2300: 2300. So, Admiral, we're finished with everything, right?
